mapper.select: select sum(lp.score_avg)/count(*) as scoreavg , lp.`code` , lp.title, lp.addressFull, lp.total, lp.propertyCompany, lp.propertyType, lp.bus, lp.lat, lp.lng, lp.images, lp.overview from t_land_score_year lp where lp.city = #{city , jdbcType=VARCHAR} and lp.querydate = #{querydate , jdbcType=VARCHAR} group by lp.`code` order by scoreavg desc

select sum(lp.score_avg)/count(*) as scoreavg , lp.`code` , lp.title, lp.addressFull, lp.total, lp.propertyCompany, lp.propertyType, lp.bus, lp.lat, lp.lng, lp.images, lp.overview from t_land_score_quarter lp where lp.city = #{city , jdbcType=VARCHAR} and lp.querydate = #{querydate , jdbcType=VARCHAR} group by lp.`code` order by scoreavg desc

select sum(lp.score_avg)/count(*) as scoreavg , lp.`code` , lp.title, lp.addressFull, lp.total, lp.propertyCompany, lp.propertyType, lp.bus, lp.lat, lp.lng, lp.images, lp.overview from t_land_score_month lp where lp.city = #{city , jdbcType=VARCHAR} and lp.querydate = #{querydate , jdbcType=VARCHAR} group by lp.`code` order by scoreavg desc
mapper.insert:
insert into t_landed_score
id,
uuid,
code,
city ,
score,
create_time,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{city , jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{score,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update t_landed_score
uuid = #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
city = #{city , jdbcType=VARCHAR},
score = #{score,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
